Title: Team Meeting
Description: Discuss project updates and assign tasks for the upcoming week.

Title: Client Presentation
Description: Deliver a presentation to the client showcasing the latest product features.

Title: Product Demo
Description: Demonstrate the product features to potential clients.

Tasks.title: Prepare demo environment
Tasks.task: Set up the environment for the product demo.

Title: Software Release
Description: Release the latest version of the software to clients.

Tasks.title: Perform final testing
Tasks.task: Conduct comprehensive testing to ensure software stability.

Title: Marketing Campaign Launch
Description: Launch a new marketing campaign to increase brand awareness.

Tasks.title: Finalize creative assets
Tasks.task: Ensure all marketing materials are ready for launch.
